description: Java class representing a fund transfer request DTO with fields for source account, destination account, and transfer amount

classes.name: FundTransferRequest
classes.description: Data transfer object (DTO) used for transferring fund transfer details such as source account, destination account, and amount

methods.name: getFromAccount
methods.description: Getter for the source account identifier

methods.name: setFromAccount
methods.description: Setter for the source account identifier

methods.name: getToAccount
methods.description: Getter for the destination account identifier

methods.name: setToAccount
methods.description: Setter for the destination account identifier
